articles.title: U.S. Assistant Secretary and His Party Here
articles.content:
U.S. Assistant Secretary and His Party Here
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- U.S. Assistant Secretary of State Christopher Hill and his party arrived here today.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Cyprus
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Cyprus
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Dimitris Christofias, President of Cyprus, on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in the message wished the president success in his noble work for the peaceful reunification and development of the country and expressed belief that the friendly relations between the DPRK and Cyprus would grow stronger.

articles.title: Greetings to Guinean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Guinean President
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Lansana Conte, President of Guinea, on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of its independence. 
					 Kim in the message noted that over the past five decades since the independence of the country the Guinean people have achieved great successes in the struggle for the national unity and the building of a new society, and the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Guinea have steadily grown stronger in the interests of the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 Kim expressed belief that the good relations between the two countries would further expand and develop in various fields in the future, too, and sincerely wished the president good health and happiness and the Guinean people greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: FM Meets Thai Delegation
articles.content:
FM Meets Thai Delegation
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Wednesday met and had a friendly conversation with the delegation of the General Department of Information of the Foreign Ministry of Thailand headed by its Director-General Tharit Charungvat.

articles.title: Vice-Chairman of Chongryon Central Standing Committee Here
articles.content:
Vice-Chairman of Chongryon Central Standing Committee Here
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Ko Tok U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, arrived here today to visit the socialist motherland.

articles.title: Head of DPRK Delegation Calls for Closer South-South Cooperation
articles.content:
Head of DPRK Delegation Calls for Closer South-South Cooperation
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Pak Kil Yon, DPRK vice-minister of Foreign Affairs who is heading its delegation, addressed the meeting of foreign ministers of the group of 77 held at the U.N. Headquarters on Sept. 26. He expressed the DPRK's views on adopting the joint stand of the group on important items concerning economic and social affairs included in the agenda of the 63rd UN General Assembly.
					 Underscoring the need for the group to boost the capability for joint actions for effectively meeting worldwide challenges in economic and social affairs, he called for putting on a more organized and positive footing collective actions for protecting the interests of its member states at the U.N. and on other international fora on the basis of its joint strategy and action program adopted at the South summits.
					
					 He also underlined the need to counter through practical joint actions the practices to put unjust political conditionalities upon the member countries of the group and all forms of coercive measures taken against them in the international economic relations, in particular. 
					
					 Urging the group to consider it as its firm policy guidelines to boost the South-South cooperation and expand it, he called for making redoubled efforts to sincerely implement action programs and projects for South-South cooperation adopted at Havana and Doha summits and various other meetings in conformity with new environment and conditions.
					
					  In this context, the DPRK delegation deemed it important to develop the existing process of South-South cooperation into the establishment of South-South economic relations with a view to ensuring the practicability of the above-said cooperation and increasing its effect, he noted, and continued: 
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK government to boost the above-said cooperation. 
					
					 The DPRK government will as always fulfill its responsibility and duty for establishing a new international economic order based on justice, equality and impartiality and boosting the South-South cooperation based on collective self-reliance.

articles.title: DPRK's Will to Strive for Lasting Peace and Stability of Korean Peninsula Reiterated
articles.content:
DPRK's Will to Strive for Lasting Peace and Stability of Korean Peninsula Reiterated
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government will as always make every possible effort to achieve national reconciliation and unity, usher in a new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity and ensure durable peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula by implementing the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration to the letter.
					 Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs who is heading the DPRK delegation, declared this at the plenary meeting of the 63rd UN General Assembly on September 27.
					
					 Noting that the efforts for reforming the UN and enhancing its role should be made in direction of building a free and peaceful, new world, he said:
					
					 It is essential to prevent such important international issues as global peace and security from being decided on in the interests of some specified countries.
					
					 To this end, it is necessary to decisively enhance the authority of the UNGA, where all its member nations exercise the equal right to representation, and strongly reject aggression against sovereign countries and interference in their internal affairs, the practices being conducted under the pretext of "protecting human rights".
					
					 Branding the United States which does not hesitate to invade independent countries by force and kill innocent civilians at present as a wrecker of global peace and the worst violator of human rights, he urged the member nations of the UN to maintain the utmost vigilance against the call for "the protection of human rights" made by the U.S. and other Western countries and never allow the politicking, selection and double standards over the issue of human rights.
					
					 Japan is the only war criminal state which occupied Korea and other Asian countries and massacred millions of innocent people, he said, adding: It has embellished its history of aggression and is still seeking to grab Tok Islet, an inalienable part of Korea's territory. Such country is not qualified to get a permanent seat at the UN Security Council under any circumstances.
					
					 Noting that the Korean people suffered under Japan's military occupation for nearly half a century and have been in the military showdown with the U.S. for over 60 years, he said: That is why they desire peace more ardently than any other people.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 To denuclearize the Korean Peninsula is the behest of President Kim Il Sung, and it is the steadfast stand of the DPRK government to settle the nuclear issue peacefully through dialogue and negotiations.
					
					 The DPRK has so far sincerely fulfilled its commitments under the agreement made at the six-party talks.
					
					 The U.S. call for unilateral inspection of the DPRK is a gangster-like assertion intended to disarm the DPRK, its warring party, disregarding the denuclearization of the whole Korean Peninsula stipulated in the September 19 joint statement the keynote of which is to remove the nuclear threat from the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever make all its sincere efforts to denuclearize the whole peninsula, but never allow any attempt to hurt its dignity and pride and infringe upon its sovereignty.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and its action program, the October 4 declaration are a landmark indicating the shortcut to the development of inter-Korean relations and the independent reunification of the Korean nation in the new century, and they are a great platform most correctly reflecting the demand of the times and the desire of the nation.
					
					 It is absolutely intolerable to ignore the historic inter-Korean declarations adopted at the north-south summits and unanimously hailed by the international community on account of the regime change in south Korea.

articles.title: Spokesman for KNPC Condemns South Korea-U.S. "Mutual Defence Treaty"
articles.content:
Spokesman for KNPC Condemns South Korea-U.S. "Mutual Defence Treaty" 
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korean National Peace Committee issued a statement Wednesday 55 years since the U.S. and the south Korean puppets fabricated the aggressive and treacherous "mutual defence treaty."
					 The statement accused the U.S. and the south Korean puppets of fabricating on October 1, 1953 the "treaty" the keynote of which is to indefinitely keep U.S. forces in south Korea and its vicinity, let the U.S. forces put the puppet forces under their control and conduct the combined military operations in case of emergency on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 Over the past 55 years since the conclusion of the "treaty" the United States has massively introduced aggressor armed forces and WMDs including nuclear weapons into south Korea, turning it into a military base for invading the DPRK and the biggest nuclear arsenal in the Far East. It has, at the same time, staged ceaseless joint military exercises and perpetrated all kinds of military provocations against the DPRK including Team Spirit, Ulji Focus Lens and RSOI, pushing the situation on the peninsula to the brink of war, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. forces deprived people of land, their cradle, to build military bases in south Korea. They are openly committing hair-raising crimes such as murder, robbery and violence, exercising extraterritorial rights in south Korea.
					
					 Such arrogant and brigandish moves of the U.S. to strengthen its domination and subjugation and launch a war of aggression have reached a more reckless and dangerous phase due to the Lee Myung Bak group's sycophancy towards the U.S. and acts of treachery. 
					
					 The Lee group is acting a shock force in the confrontation with fellow countrymen and a war of aggression, after totally negating the agreement made with fellow countrymen for reunification and the prosperity of the nation and blustering that "the alliance should not be weakened" when depending to the disgraceful and treacherous treaty signed with foreign forces half a century ago. This is a gang of wicked traitors to the nation and servants for the U.S. keen to ignite a nuclear war. 
					
					 The statement called on all Koreans to struggle for the annulment of all aggressive, shackling and treacherous agreements and treaties including the above-said "treaty" and an end to the U.S. military presence and domination over south Korea and mete out a stern punishment to the Lee group.

articles.title: 10th National Exhibition of Invention and New Technology Opens
articles.content:
10th National Exhibition of Invention and New Technology Opens
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The 10th national exhibition of invention and new technology opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition Wednesday.
					 Displayed in the venue were at least 1,500 items of invention and new technology as well as products manufactured on the basis of them, models, diagrams and multimedia highly appreciated at the prize invention and innovation contests held by different social organizations, ministries, national institutions and provinces. 
					
					 During the period of the exhibition there will take place the dissemination of science and technology involving different forms and methods including public presentation and technological exchange and discussions on the issues of widely introducing and generalizing the scientific and technological achievements in production and construction.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Vice-Premier of the Cabinet Ro Tu Chol, Department Director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Ri Kwang Ho, Minister of Education Kim Yong Jin, officials concerned, scientists, technologists and working people. 
					
					 President of the State Academy of Sciences Pyon Yong Rip in an opening address said that under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the whole society is now attaching importance to science and technology and a vigorous mass technical innovation movement is under way in the DPRK to provide a scientific and technological guarantee for building a rich and powerful nation.
					
					 He stressed that achievements made in inventions in recent years clearly prove that nothing is impossible when the people fully display the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance depending on science and technology.

articles.title: Music and Dance Performance Given
articles.content:
Music and Dance Performance Given 
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- A music and dance performance was given by artistes of the Ryanggang Provincial Art Troupe at the Taehongdan County Cultural Hall on Tuesday to mark the 10th anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "On Bringing about a Signal Turn in Potato Farming".
					 It was appreciated by Choe Thae Bok, Choe Yong Rim, Kwak Pom Gi, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Pak Nam Gi, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, leading officials of ministries and national institutions, officials and other working people in the province.
					
					 The performance began with female vocal solo and chorus "Taehongdan of 3,000-ri". Its repertoire included female vocal solo "When we walk along the road between fields", male vocal solo and female pangchang "Let's be proud of potato", dance "Spring that visited the base", female vocal solo of folk song "Let's sing of Taehongdan" and female vocal solo and chorus "Oh, My motherland of Songun".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung who devoted all his life to the happiness of the people regarding it as his maxim to believe in people as in Heaven and those of Kim Jong Il who visited the county and set forth the policy of bringing about a signal turn in potato farming and wisely led the struggle to implement it.

articles.title: Photo Exhibition in Ryanggang Province
articles.content:
Photo Exhibition in Taehongdan County
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition is going on at the Taehongdan County Cultural Hall, Ryanggang Province to mark the 10th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "On Bringing about a Signal Turn in Potato Farming."
					 On display in the venue of the exhibition are photos showing the energetic revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il including "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il gives field guidance to Potato Institute of Academy of Agricultural Science" and "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il gives field guidance to Taehongdan Potato Processing Factory."
					
					 Also on display are at least 150 photos showing officials and working people in Taehongdan County in their endeavors to effect a signal turn under the concern of the whole society and those reflecting the validity and vitality of the Workers' Party of Korea's policy on bringing about a signal turn in potato farming such as "To Taehongdan County, true to the intention of the great General" and "Fields in Mt. Paektu under potato flowers." 
					
					 Among the visitors are officials of ministries and national institutions and officials and working people in Ryanggang Province.

articles.title: Cuban Children's Drawing Exhibition Held
articles.content:
Cuban Children's Drawing Exhibition Held
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- A Cuban children's drawing exhibition was held at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace on Tuesday on the occasion of the 60th birthday of the DPRK. It was co-sponsored by the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries.
					 Among those attending the exhibition were Kil Chol Hyok, secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, and schoolchildren in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK Jose Manuel Galego Montano and staff members of the embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Speakers said that the exhibition serves as an important occasion in strengthening friendship between the peoples and children of the two countries.
					
					 They referred to the DPRK-Cuba friendly relations favorably developing under the deep care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and Fidel Castro Ruz and Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					 They said that the exhibition would offer an opportunity to see the Cuban revolution vigorously advancing along the road of socialism and the future of everlasting friendship between the two countries.

articles.title: Paekho Art Works of Korea
articles.content:
Paekho Art Works of Korea
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The Paekho works of art of the DPRK are attracting keen attention at home and abroad.
					 The works created by veteran painters of the Korea Paekho Trading Corperation are clear in individualities, bold in strokes and exquisite in depiction.
					
					 Typical masterpieces are the Korean paintings "Tiger in Mt. Paektu" and "Mt. Paektu in February" and the jewel picture "Sunrise on Mt. Paektu" by Pak Chang Sop who is Kim Il Sung Prize laureate, Labour Hero and People's Artist. 
					
					 These works valued at national treasures render flawless ideological and artistic depiction of the immortal greatness of the illustrious commanders shining with Mt. Paektu, the sacred mountain of revolution. 
					
					 The Korean paintings "Lakeside in Autumn " and "Janggo Dance" and the oils "Moonlit Night at Home Village", "Blue Sky" and "Korean Bow" illustrative of novel idea and peculiar techniques well show the features of ever developing Juche-oriented fine art.
					
					 Landscape paintings including the jewel pictures "Snowscape at Dwarf- Pine-Tree Post", "Bright Lights on River Jangja", "Echoes of Ulrim Falls" and "Fairyland of Poman-ri" are consummate delineation of the validity and vitality of Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The painters of the corporation have also created lots of large panoramic pictures intensively showing histories, cultures and traditions of various countries, among them "History of Building Sea Dams in the Netherlands" and "Olympics of Ancient Greece".
					
					 After seeing a Paekho art show held in the building of the European Parliament in Brussels some time ago, public figures, art experts and lovers from different countries were unstinting in their praises of the high level of the Korean art.

articles.title: Mt. Kuwol, Beauty Spot of Hwanghae
articles.content:
Mt. Kuwol, Beauty Spot of Hwanghae
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- There is Mt. Kuwol, one of the six famous mountains of Korea in South Hwanghae Province.
					 Mt. Kuwol is made up of low and high peaks including Sahwang Peak 954 meters above sea level.
					
					 Its name is derived from the beautiful scenery of the mountain dressed with yellow leaves in September.
					
					 Mt. Kuwol with peculiar and beautiful mountains and valleys stands high between the vast Jaeryong and Unryul plains, demonstrating its wonderful and dignified feature.
					
					 Ecstatic, indeed, is the landscape of the mountain--99 peaks, ridges and valleys, thick forests and refreshing waterfalls and crystal-clear streams.
					
					 In particular, the Ryongyon Falls, the Samhyongje Falls and the maple of September are marvelous.
					
					 Tangun founded Kojoson (ancient Korea) which existed from the early 30th century B.C. to 108 B.C. There are in the mountain the Tangun Rock on which he sat and studied and many places associated with Tangun-related legends and many historical relics including Woljong Temple.
					
					 Abundant are fauna and flora resources in the mountain, typical woodland of South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 Today Mt. Kuwol has been arranged well as befits a beauty spot of Hwanghae area under the popular policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK and is widely used as an excellent cultural recreation ground for the working people and school youth and children.

articles.title: Abolition of South Korea-U.S. "Mutual Defence Treaty" Called for
articles.content:
Abolition of South Korea-U.S. "Mutual Defence Treaty" Called for
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korea-U.S. "mutual defence treaty" is an aggressive, brigandish and unequal military "treaty" as it legalizes and justifies the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' permanent presence in south Korea, their moves to provoke a war against the DPRK and their robber-like arbitrary practices and all sorts of atrocities and imposes only submission, disgrace and sufferings upon the south Korean people. Rodong Sinmun today observes this in a signed commentary carried 55 years since the U.S. imperialists fabricated the above-said "treaty."
					 The commentary goes on: 
					
					 By cooking up the "treaty" the U.S. imperialists laid a "legal foundation" for keeping south Korea under their occupation for an indefinite period contrary to the will and wishes of the Korean nation and launching armed invasion against the DPRK any moment they deem necessary. Herein lie the aggressive nature and danger of the "treaty."
					
					 The blood-stained history of the U.S. presence in south Korea saliently reveals the aggressive and predatory nature of this "treaty," the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The above-said "treaty" is nothing but an illegal and aggressive document devoid of any justification to remain valid either from the viewpoint of international law or in the light of the aspiration and wishes of the Korean nation. Accordingly, it should have been annulled long ago. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. is persistently pursuing its policy of keeping south Korea under its occupation and the moves for confrontation and war against the DPRK on the strength of the "treaty" although the Cold War demised and the Korean nation lives in the June 15 era of reunification. 
					
					 The Korean people can never remain an onlooker to the reckless acts of the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group, its lackeys, driving the inter-Korean relations and the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the evermore deplorable phase, while beclouding the prospect of the peaceful settlement of the nuclear issue and the six-party talks.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities would be well advised to properly understand the trend of the times and the will of the Korean nation and opt for immediately scrapping the "treaty" and withdrawing the U.S. forces from south Korea without delay.

articles.title: DPRK-Targeted Joint Military Exercises Slammed
articles.content:
DPRK-Targeted Joint Military Exercises Slammed
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The provocative joint military exercises aiming at invading the DPRK should be stopped in south Korea in order to achieve durable peace of the Korean Peninsula and pave a wide avenue for peaceful reunification as required by the times and the nation, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a signed article.
					 To put an end to the joint military exercises targeted against the DPRK is a realistic and important issue in ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The above-said joint military exercises are the root cause of aggravating the military confrontation on the peninsula and bringing the danger of war to it.
					
					 They are a clear revelation of the U.S. criminal hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is talking about "peace and stability" on the peninsula, but it is, in actuality, pursuing confrontation and war against the DPRK. All its military actions in Korea are not aimed at preserving "peace" but at serving the purpose of rounding off the preparations to carry out its policy for invading the DPRK.
					
					 The large-scale joint military exercises are a main part of the moves stepped up by the U.S. in south Korea to launch a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 This year the U.S. staged Key Resolve and Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises. These were very dangerous military provocations which indicated that its adventurous strategy for a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK remains unchanged.
					
					 The above-mentioned joint military exercises are a product of the reckless and traitorous moves of the south Korean puppets for confrontation and war. 
					
					 Those moves of the U.S. and its followers, the south Korean puppets are rendering the situation on the peninsula so tense that a war may break out there any moment. All the DPRK-targeted joint military exercises being staged in south Korea should be stopped unconditionally. 
					
					 All Koreans should never allow the above-said joint military exercises as they escalate confrontation and tension on the peninsula and increase the danger of war, the article concludes.

articles.title: China's National Day Greeted
articles.content:
China's National Day Greeted
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Leading papers today dedicate articles to the 59th anniversary of the foundation of the People's Republic of China.
					 The Korean people warmly congratulate the friendly Chinese people on their national day and wish them greater success in their future struggle for the building of a harmonious socialist society based on a scientific view on development, say the signed articles.
					
					 The foundation of the PRC on October 1, 1949 enabled the Chinese people to emerge masters of their country and their own destinies and take the road of building socialism, notes Rodong Sinmun, and goes on;
					
					 The Chinese government has brought an epoch-making change in the vast land of China where backwardness and poverty once prevailed by correctly organizing and mobilizing the Chinese people to the struggle for implementing the line and polices set forth by the Communist Party of China in every period of the revolutionary development and at its each stage. China is known in the international community as a country strong in national power and a country where economy, culture and science and technology are making rapid progress. It has taken on new looks in the world.
					
					 The DPRK and China are close neighbors and the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and peoples are long-standing. The bilateral friendship is developing favorably as the days go by under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries. It is the common desire and wishes of the two peoples and beneficial to ensuring peace, security and stability in the region to steadily develop the traditional DPRK-China friendship. 
					
					 Minju Joson says that the Korean people will make positive efforts to boost the DPRK-China friendship in the common interests of the peoples of the two countries in the future, too.

articles.title: "International Day of Old Persons" Observed
articles.content:
"International Day of Old Persons" Observed
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Leading papers today in articles dedicated to the "International Day of Old Persons" call upon each country to take positive measures to solve the issue of aging population and protect the aged, matters of worldwide concern.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the declining birthrate is a main cause of aging population, underlining the need for every country to pursue a scientific policy on population in keeping with its population situation and thus adjust the speed of the aging of population.
					
					 The DPRK has taken necessary measures purposefully as regards the process of aging population by properly comprehending the impact it has on the socio-economic life and correctly reflecting it in the country's population policy, the daily notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Central Committee of the Korean Federation for Care of the Aged is making positive efforts to maintain close relations and cooperation with various international organizations over the issue of aging population and the protection of the aged.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the issues of settling the problem of aging population and protecting the aged are addressed under the deep care of the state and society in the popular masses-centered Korean-style socialist society where man is considered as the most valuable being.

articles.title: Abolition of NSL Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Abolition of NSL Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of various strata in south Korea held a rally in Seoul on Sept. 27 to denounce traitor Lee Myung Bak's fascist suppression.
					 Present there were members of civic and public organizations including the People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "National Security Law", the Joint Measure Committee for the Frustration of the Suppression of the Socialist Workers' Federation and the Repeal of NSL which Violates the Freedom of Political Activities and Thinking, the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration and the (south) Korean Council of Youth Organizations.
					
					 Speakers at the rally accused the security authorities of recklessly searching all at once the offices of the solidarity and its affiliated organizations in various areas and houses of leading members of the organization including Kim Sung Gyo, its permanent co-representative, on charges of violation of the NSL.
					
					 The suppression of the solidarity predicts that many more cases will be faked up in the future as it brings to light the true colors of the Lee "government," they added. 
					
					 Calling on all organizations to pool efforts and turn out in the movement for the repeal of the NSL, they declared candlelight would be held higher to get the label of "enemy benefiting" attached to the progressive organizations lifted and have the evil law repealed.
					
					 A resolution read out at the rally accused Lee Myung Bak of expanding and strengthening the repressive machines including the "National Intelligence Service", "the Defense Security Command", "Security Investigation Corps" and the Prosecutor's Office and arresting and detaining many people on charges of violation of the NSL.
					
					 The resolution stressed that an all-people action would be launched to get the undemocratic, anti-reunification and unpopular law abolished on December 1, six decades after the enactment of the NSL.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Pro-Democracy Martyrs Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Pro-Democracy Martyrs Held in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Events to honor the memory of martyrs and other victims who fell in the struggle for the nation and democracy were held in Seoul on September 27 under the sponsorship of the committee for all-people memorial service of south Korea.
					 Present there were over 500 members of civic and public organizations and political parties, including the Federation of Peasants Associations, the Reunification Meeting, the Unification Study Centre, the South Headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification, the Federation of the Poor, the Teachers Union and the Democratic Labor Party, and bereaved families of martyrs and victims.
					
					 There took place the 19th all-people meeting for memorial service and inheritance of martyrs' spirit.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting condemned the Lee Myung Bak "government" for having made seizure and search for the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration and checked a rally demanding the abrogation of the "National Security Law", which was due to be held in Thapgol Park in Seoul, and a street march of the participants in the memorial service on the same day.
					
					 They declared that they would wage an undaunted struggle to check the globalization of the U.S. imperialist capital, the struggle launched by the martyrs for the nation and democracy, and fight to achieve the national reunification and build a society where independence and equality are ensured and the popular masses are emancipated, the desire of the martyrs.
					
					 They called upon all the people to turn out in the struggle for great national unity and independence against the U.S.
					
					 Then a resolution was read out, which said: We swear before the martyrs to spare no efforts to protect the people's right to live and their vital rights and achieve peace of the Korean Peninsula and courageously turn out in the unavoidable struggle against the Lee Myung Bak neo-liberal fascist regime.
					
					 The meeting was followed by a candlelight cultural event.
					
					 Meanwhile, the 3rd memorial service for women martyrs and victims who fell in the struggle for the nation and democracy was held at the entrance of Radio and Correspondence College under the co-sponsorship of the Women's Solidarity and the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps that day.

articles.title: Just Cause of Korean People and Youth Supported
articles.content:
Just Cause of Korean People and Youth Supported
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- A resolution for solidarity with the just cause of the Korean people and youth was adopted at the Asia-Pacific regional meeting of the World Federation of Democratic Youth held in Nepal from Sept. 22 to 24.
					 Noting that the "Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity" adopted on Oct. 4, 2007, was fully supported and welcomed everywhere in the world as an action program for comprehensively carrying into practice the June 15 joint declaration, the landmark of Korea's reunification, the resolution said:
					
					 Nuclear war exercises and arms buildup ceaselessly conducted by the U.S. imperialists and their followers in and around the Korean Peninsula are seriously endangering the peace and stability of the peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 We strongly demand that the United States put an end to its hostile policy toward the DPRK, replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace accord, discontinue the joint military exercises and arms buildup for aggression in south Korea and immediately remove all its military bases from the Korean Peninsula and its surrounding areas. 
					
					 The present pro-U.S. conservative forces of south Korea should not resort to confrontation and war moves going against the trend of the times but make policy switchover for reconciliation, cooperation and reunification.
					
					 We hold that the countries responsible for the tragic division of the Korean Peninsula should do things helpful to the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea. 
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people and youth in their just cause to realize the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and build a great prosperous powerful socialist nation.

articles.title: Birthday of WPK Observed in Mexico
articles.content:
Birthday of WPK Observed in Mexico
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Bulletins were released by the Mexican organizations on the occasion of the 63rd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism issued bulletin No. 12 titled "The Workers' Party of Korea which guides the Songun revolution." It carried a photograph of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il standing together.
					
					 The bulletin said in an article that the steadfast anti-imperialist stand maintained by the DPRK in the struggle against imperialism and spectacular successes achieved by the Korean people in building a great prosperous powerful socialist nation would be unthinkable without the WPK, the guiding force of the DPRK society.
					
					 Under the leadership of Kim Jong Il the WPK will always demonstrate its might as a force steering the cause of Songun, it stressed.
					
					 The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea issued bulletin No. 24 titled "Statesman with noble sense of moral obligation." It carried a photograph of Kim Jong Il standing on the tribune of honor of the Kim Il Sung Square.
					
					 The bulletin recalled that in July 1994 when Kim Il Sung demised, Kim Jong Il put up the slogan "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung will always be with us", imbuing the people with the faith that he is always alive.
					
					 It said that Kim Jong Il made public various works including "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries" and "On Establishing the Communist Moral Trait throughout the Society," making sure that to respect the forerunners of the revolution, highly estimate their spirit and exploits and learn from their traits became the trend of the whole society.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Observed in Guinea and Italy
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Observed in Guinea and Italy
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- A lecture and a reading session were held in Guinea and a Korean book and photo exhibition in Italy between Sept. 10 and 23 on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 On display in the exhibition hall were famous works of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, photos showing their revolutionary exploits and books and photos introducing the Korean people.
					
					 Riyad Chaloub, chief of the Guinean Group for the Study of February 16 Art, said in the lecture titled "The Invincible Workers' Party of Korea" that after its birth the WPK has always covered the road of victory and glory without any deflection or turns and twists as it is guided only by the Juche idea.
					
					 Camano Vitor, chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Conakry, Guinea, said at the reading session that the socialist ideological position of the DPRK has been further consolidated under the outstanding Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il and that only victory and glory are always in store for the WPK firmly holding fast to ideology.
					
					 The international secretary of the Communist Party of Italy said that the exhibition provided an opportunity to know better about the WPK and the Korean people rallied as one in mind around Kim Jong Il. And he hoped that the Korean people would make greater successes in their efforts to build a great prosperous powerful nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: RPDC hara todos esfuerzos por paz y estabilidad en Peninsula Coreana
articles.content:
RPDC hara todos esfuerzos por paz y estabilidad en Peninsula Coreana
Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ATCC) -- El gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ejecutara cabalmente tambien en el futuro la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio Norte-Sur y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre para realizar asi la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y abrir la nueva epoca de la reunificacion independiente,  la paz y la prosperidad y hara todos sus esfuerzos por lograr la paz y la estabilidad permanentes en la Peninsula Coreana.
					Asi senalo el vicecanciller coreano Pak Kil Yon quien preside la delegacion de la RPDC en su discurso pronunciado el 27 de septiembre en la reunion plenaria del 63 periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU y continuo.
					
					Los esfuerzos por reformar la ONU y fortalecer su papel hay que dirigirse debidamente a construir un nuevo mundo libre y pacifico, y lo indispensable es frenar que los importantes problemas internacionales como el de preservar la paz y la seguridad del mundo  sean decididos por los intereses de algunos paises determinados.
					
					Para este fin, hay que elevar decisivamente la autoridad de la Asamblea General de la ONU en que todos los paises miembros ejercen su derecho de igual representante y rechazar cabalmente la agresion y la intervencion en asuntos internos contra los paises soberanos que se perpetran bajo el pretexto de la "defensa de DDHH".
					
					EE.UU. que invade con fuerzas armadas a los paises independientes y perpetra sin titubeo la masacre a los civiles inocentes, es precisamente el perturbador de la paz mundial y el caudillo de la violacion a DDHH.
					
					Los paises miembros de la ONU deben elevar al maximo la vigilancia sobre EE.UU. y otros paises occidentales que peroran de la "defensa de DDHH"  y no deben permitir jamas la politizacion, la selectividad y la pauta de doble rasero de de DDHH. 
					
					El Japon es el unico pais criminal de guerra que embellece su historia agresiva de haber ocupado a Corea y otros paises asiaticos y asesinado millones de habitantes inocentes, y que intenta extorsionar la isla Tok, sagrado territorio de Corea. Debido a tales crimenes,  Japon no puede tener jamas la calificacion de ser un pais miembro permanente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					El pueblo coreano estaba bajo la ocupacion militar de Japon durante casi medio siglo y esta ahora en el enfrentamiento militar con EE.UU. que perdura mas de 60 anos y, por esta razon, este pueblo desea la paz mas ardientemente que otros.
					
					La desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana es el legado del Presidente Kim Il Sung, y la RPDC  mantiene la invariable posicion de resolver por via pacifica y con dialogos el problema nuclear y hasta ahora cumplio sinceramente su deber asumido por el acuerdo de las conversaciones a 6 bandas. 
					
					EE.UU. intenta inspeccionar unilateralmente a la RPDC, lo cual es una demanda bandidesca enderezada a desarmar a esta, una de las partes beligerantes, y pretende abandonar la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula de toda Corea cuya esencia es la eliminacion de la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. segun la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre.
					
					La RPDC hara tambien en el futuro sus esfuerzos sinceros por la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y pero, no permitira jamas cualesquier intentos a atentar su dignidad, su orgullo y su soberania.
					
					La Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre que es el programa practico de la primera son el jalon que ilumina el atajo para el desarrollo de las relaciones Norte-Sur del nuevo siglo y la reunificacion independiente nacional y son un gran programa de la reunificacion de Corea que refleja claramente la demanda de la epoca y la aspiracion de la nacion coreana.
					
					No es permitido jamas que se desprecien las historicas declaraciones Norte-Sur que fueron acordadas y aprobadas en las Cumbres Norte-Sur y aplaudas unanimemente por la comunidad internacional por motivo del cambio del "poder" en el Sur de Corea.

articles.title: RPDC cumplira su responsabilidad y deber para la cooperacion Sur-Sur
articles.content:
RPDC cumplira su responsabilidad y deber para la cooperacion Sur-Sur
Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ATCC) -- En la reunion de cancilleres del Grupo de los 77 efectuada el 26 de septiembre en la sede de la ONU el vicecanciller Pak Kil Yon al frente de la delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea expreso su criterio relativo a que se iba a establecer la posicion conjunta de este grupo sobre las agendas principales de los dominios economicos y sociales sometidas a deliberacion del 63o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU.
					El Grupo de los 77 debe elevar su capacidad de accion comun para enfrentar con eficacia a los desafios mundiales en las ramas arriba mencionadas, dijo Pak y continuo:
					
					Hay que hacer mas organizativa y dinamica la accion colectiva por defender los intereses de los paises miembros del Grupo en la ONU y otras escenas internacionales basandose en la estrategia comun y el plan de accion preparados en las cumbres del Sur.
					
					En particular, se debe oponer  las acciones comunes practicas a los injustos condicionamientos  politicos y las medidas coercitivas de toda indole contra los paises miembros del Grupo en las relaciones economicas internacionales.
					
					Tiene que impulsar la labor de ampliar y desarrollar la cooperacion Sur-Sur tomandola como firme guia politica.
					
					Tambien, es preciso duplicar los esfuerzos para ejecutar con lealtad de conformidad con las nuevas circunstancias y condiciones el programa de accion de cooperacion Sur-Sur y otros planes aprobados en las cumbres de La Habana y Doha y otras reuniones.
					
					Para este fin, la delegacion coreana considera que a fin de garantizar la capacidad practica de la cooperacion Sur-Sur y elevar su eficiencia es importante hacer llegar el actual proceso de cooperacion Sur-Sur al establecimiento de relaciones economicas Sur-Sur, dijo Pak y enfatizo:
					
					Ampliar y desarrollar la cooperacion Sur-Sur es la invariable posicion del gobierno de la RPDC.
					
					En el futuro tambien, este cumplira su responsabilidad y deber en la tarea de establecer el nuevo orden economico internacional basado en la justicia, igualdad e imparcialidad y ampliar y desarrollar mas la cooperacion Sur-Sur basada en la autoconfianza colectiva.

articles.title: CNCDP denuncia "tratado de defensa mutua surcoreano-estadounidense"
articles.content:
CNCDP denuncia "tratado de defensa mutua surcoreano-estadounidense"
Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ATCC) -- En ocasion del 55o aniversario de la firma del agresivo y vendepatria "tratado de defensa mutua" EE.UU. - Sur de Corea, el portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) hizo publica este miercoles una declaracion para condenarlo.
					El primero de octubre de 1953, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos concertaron ese tratado cuyo contenido principal es ubicar por tiempo indefinido a las tropas estadounidenses en el Sur de Corea y su contorno, conceder a ellas el control sobre el ejercito surcoreano y desarrollar en el tiempo de emergencia de la Peninsula Coreana las operaciones militares conjuntas, revela el documento y continua:
					
					En virtud de ese pacto, durante los 55 anos pasados, EE.UU. convirtio el Sur de Corea en la base militar para la agresion al Norte de Corea y en el polvorin nuclear mas grande en el Extremo Oriente al introducir a sus tropas agresoras, las armas nucleares y otros armamentos de exterminio masivo. Ademas, libro incesantemente "Team Spirit", "Ulji Focus Lens" y otros ejercicios militares conjuntos para agredir al Norte de Corea y cometio la provocacion militar de toda indole llevando la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana a la aguda coyuntura de guerra. 
					
					Hoy dia, las tropas estadounidenses convierten la cuna de vida de la poblacion surcoreana en sus bases militares y cometen abiertamente asesinatos, saqueos, actos violentos y otros crimenes horribles actuando como entes extraterritoriales. 
					
					La dominacion y subyugacion arrogantes y gangsteriles por parte de EE.UU. y sus maniobras para la guerra de agresion llegan a la etapa mas imprudente y peligrosa debido al servilismo proyanqui de la banda de Lee Myung Bak. 
					
					Esta horda de connotados traidores a la nacion y ejecutantes de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. sirve de brigada de choque en la confrontacion fratricida y en la eventual guerra de agresion negando completamente los acuerdos aprobados con sus coterraneos por la reunificacion y la prosperidad de la nacion y diciendo que "no se debe debilitar la alianza" en cuanto al "tratado" vergonzoso y traidor concertado hace medio siglo con las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					Toda la nacion coreana debe anular el "tratado de defensa mutua" surcoreano-estadounidense y los demas convenios y tratados agresivos y leoninos, poner punto final a la ocupacion militar y dominacion de EE.UU. sobre el suelo surcoreano y castigar severamente a la banda de Lee Myung Bak.

articles.title: Ejercicio militar anti-RPDC es expresion de la politica de agresion
articles.content:
Ejercicio militar anti-RPDC es expresion de la politica de agresion 
Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ATCC) -- Para lograr la paz duradera de la Peninsula Coreana y abrir el camino de la reunificacion pacifica de acuerdo con la aspiracion de la epoca y la demanda de la nacion coreana, hay que parar en el suelo surcoreano los provocativos ejercicios militares conjuntos que suponen la agresion al Norte de Corea.
					Senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual publicado este miercoles y prosigue: 
					
					El cese de los simulacros conjuntos resulta un asunto importante y practico para la preservacion de la paz en la Peninsula Coreana porque devienen el factor principal, que agrava el enfrentamiento militar en esta area y acarrea el peligro de la guerra, y la expresion directa de la criminal politica hostil a Corea de EE.UU. 
					
					Aunque EE.UU. habla de la "paz" y la "estabilidad" de la Peninsula Coreana, persigue en realidad el enfrentamiento y la guerra de agresion a la RPDC. 
					
					Todas las actividades militares de EE.UU. en esta region no se desarrollan para la "paz", sino para la preparacion de la guerra orientada a cumplir la politica de agresion a la RPDC. 
					
					Lo fundamental de esta labor es precisamente el ejercicio belico conjunto de gran envergadura.
					
					En particular, los simulacros "Key Resolve" y "Ulji Freedom Guardian", que desplego este ano EE.UU., demostro que no hay ningun cambio en su aventurera estrategica de ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC. 
					
					Los ejercicios militares conjuntos resultan producto de las imprudentes maniobras de guerra y confrontacion antinacional de los titeres surcoreanos y llevan al estado sumamente critico la ya tirante situacion de la Peninsula Coreana donde se puede desatar una guerra en cualquier momento. 
					
					Toda la nacion coreana no debe tolerar nunca los ejercicios militares conjuntos contra el Norte de Corea que deben ser parados incondicionalmente en el Sur de Corea.
